hero.title: Set It, Forget It, Stay Protected, Stay Lazy!
hero.subtitle: The world's first automated backup device that physically disconnects your drives from hackers, ransomware, and AI surveillance.

problem.title: The Problem With Traditional Backups
problem.alwaysConnectedDesc: Your backup drive is exposed 24/7 to ransomware, hackers, and system failures.
problem.manualBackupDesc: Life gets busy. One forgotten backup could cost you everything.
problem.cloudPrivacyDesc: Your data analyzed by AI, stored on someone else's servers, vulnerable to breaches.

solution.title: The SmartHDD Solution
solution.subtitle: Physical disconnection meets smart automation
solution.feature1Desc: Your drives are offline 99% of the time. Hackers can't access what's not connected.
solution.feature2Desc: Set your schedule once. SmartHDD handles everything automatically.
solution.feature3Desc: Your data stays on YOUR drives. No cloud, no AI scanning, 100% offline.

products.title: Choose Your Protection Level
products.note: * Drives not included. SmartHDD works with any standard USB flash drive or external HDD.
products.pageSubtitle: Choose the SmartHDD model that fits your backup needs
products.noteDesc: SmartHDD works with any standard USB flash drive or external HDD you already own.

howItWorks.title: How SmartHDD Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Plug SmartHDD into your PC, connect your USB drives, and set your backup schedule using our simple software.
howItWorks.step2Desc: SmartHDD physically connects your drive at the scheduled time, your PC performs the backup, then automatically disconnects it.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Your drives remain offline and protected from ransomware, hackers, and wear. You never have to remember to backup again.

benefits.title: Why SmartHDD?
benefits.ransomwareDesc: Disconnected drives can't be encrypted by ransomware. Your backups stay safe even if your PC is compromised.
benefits.privacyDesc: Your data never touches the cloud. No AI scanning, no third-party access, no privacy concerns.
benefits.automatedDesc: Configure once, protected forever. Perfect for busy people who value their data but hate maintenance.
benefits.longevityDesc: Drives last longer when not constantly powered. Reduce wear and tear by 95%.
benefits.flexibleDesc: Daily, weekly, or monthly backups. Full or incremental. Pro version supports independent schedules per drive.
benefits.simpleDesc: No technical knowledge required. If you can plug in a USB drive, you can use SmartHDD.

about.title: About SmartHDD
about.subtitle: Protecting your data with innovative hardware solutions
about.storyPara1: SmartHDD was born from a simple observation: traditional backup solutions leave your data vulnerable 24/7. Whether it's ransomware attacks, hardware failures, or unauthorized access, your backup drives are constantly at risk when they remain connected to your computer.
about.storyPara2: We asked ourselves: 'What if your backup drives could be physically disconnected when not in use?' This question led us to develop the world's first automated backup device that combines smart scheduling with physical disconnection - giving you the best of both worlds: convenience and security.
about.missionDesc: To provide the most secure and effortless backup solution for everyone who values their data
about.visionDesc: A world where data loss is a thing of the past, and backup security is guaranteed
about.valuesDesc: Privacy, security, simplicity, and innovation in everything we create
about.ransomwareDesc: When your backup drive is disconnected, ransomware cannot encrypt it. Your data stays safe even if your main computer is compromised.
about.privacyDesc: Your data never touches the cloud. No AI scans your files, no third parties have access, and you maintain complete control.
about.longevityDesc: Drives that aren't constantly powered last significantly longer, reducing wear and extending the life of your hardware.
about.zeroMaintenanceDesc: Set your schedule once and never think about backups again. SmartHDD handles everything automatically.
about.getInTouchDesc: Have questions? Want to learn more? We'd love to hear from you.

howItWorksExtended.subtitle: Simple setup, automated protection, complete peace of mind
howItWorksExtended.physicalDesc: Unlike software solutions, SmartHDD physically disconnects your drives. When disconnected, your drives are completely invisible to your computer and any threats.
howItWorksExtended.schedulingDesc: Set different schedules for different backup types. Daily for documents, weekly for photos, monthly for archives. Full control over your backup strategy.
howItWorksExtended.zeroTouchDesc: After initial setup, you never need to touch your backup drives again. SmartHDD handles everything automatically, exactly when scheduled.
howItWorksExtended.worksWithAnyDesc: Compatible with all USB flash drives, external HDDs, and SSDs. Use the drives you already own - no special hardware required.
